ingredient.name: Quercetin
ingredient.description: Flavonoid with prebiotic properties and anti-inflammatory benefits

microbiome_effects.mechanism: Produces bioactive metabolites and increases beneficial bacteria growth
Anti-inflammatory effects through microbiome modulation enhance SCFA production

metabolic_effects.mechanism: Produces bioactive metabolites and enhances short-chain fatty acid production

symptom_effects.population_notes: Metabolic syndrome management with gut microbiome diversity improvement

citations.title: Recent studies showing gut microbiome-dependent effects
